title: The game doesn't notice when i get an S rank.
body:
Hello,
I've been having this problem recently where I get an S- or higher and the game doesn't give me a chest even though i haven't earned it on that champion. Then I go and check my highest rank on the champion and instead of the S+ that I got I see N/A. The most recent issue is with Sona{{champion:37}} . You can check my account I got a couple of S ranks with her in my recent games but still no chest. When I go and check a chest is available. Does it just take a really long time or is it a glitch? If you need proof just let me know i'll send screenshots.
Thanks for your help in advance.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but wasn't able to discover anything out of the ordinary!  It looks like you could be out of mastery chest drops for the week.  You can check your profile page to see how many you have available, and should refresh once a week per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!
